ModMetaData.name: WM Hydroponics with lamps
ModMetaData.author: Wishmaster
ModMetaData.description: Requires HugsLib. Vanilla hydroponics bassin with built in sunlamps Vanilla hydroponics only cover its own tiles. Sunlamps turn off at night, thus power use decreases. The sunlamp power use is based on the vanilla's sunlamp power use per tiles. Also features to set a default crop for a given plant grower building ('ponics, plant pot, VG stuff...). !!! EXPERIMENTAL FEATURE !!! Generic injector for lamps on non-vanilla plant growers.
